attributes.action: Request the Environment dept to sponsor an information dvd for every British household on "Problems and Prospects for refuse collection and Recycling".
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
People across the United Kingdom are 
adjusting to Local Authority efforts 
to increase recycling and reduce 
rubbish. Such an initiative if 
imaginatively produced would help 
educate and inform and should increase 
recycling effort generally. Such a dvd 
should be understanding of the 
difficulties for many. The soundtrack 
should have alternative light classical 
music to ensure many can watch and 
enjoy. It would help counteract the 
agitators on some tabloid 
newspapers. There would be a 25 minute 
national section and another locally 
produced part for each region of the 
UK.
